name: Beermageddon Revolution
description:
Beermageddon Revolution is 3D game based on my LD#32 Entry, Beermageddon. It is in very early state, but i made one level playable to i can get feedback.

HELP BOB TO GET PEOPLE DRUNK!

Objective: Get 80% people happy, and escape to next city using BEERTRUCK!

How To Play: Move Bob with W, A, S, D, or Arrow Keyes, use mouse to target, and shoot pints of beer. If you run out of beer, go to the truck to replenish.

It is only way to bring freedom and defeat evil president Duckass!
